title: Random Games Lag indefinately
body: Recently while playing there would be a single random lag spike maybe around late game, happens in like maybe once in 15 games but this specific lag spike causes me to not be able to get back into game in a playable state. I have waited maybe 30 minutes so far to try and reconnect but without fail I have not been able to get back into the game and only "reconnect" to see the stats. I have restarted my game, client, computer, and switched to wifi (only use ethernet cord when playing), but nothing will let me be able to reconnect. I also have friends who say they experience the same thing as me. If anyone has a solution please let me know!

replies.body: It sounds like your connection is degrading in-game and eventually kicking you off.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's happening here, which I believe will indicate an issue with your network.  The results should provide some troubleshooting steps for your issue, but you can also use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) issues guide for more immediate steps.  Let me know if you have any questions!
